run001.base_instruction: Insert the rebar into the target position

substep_reasonings.reasoning: Position the gripper above the rebar
Approach and grasp the rebar firmly
Lift the rebar and move towards target
Align the rebar with the insertion hole
Insert the rebar into the hole
Push the rebar deeper and verify insertion
